title: Псих
overview: Oleg is a metropolitan psychotherapist. Clients of the central district of Moscow line up to him. Only lately Oleg doesn't like them, he tolerates them. Midlife crisis, life with mom at 40, loss of self-esteem, drug addiction, irritability and growing aggression. None of the clients are aware of his problems. From the outside, he seems successful, happily married, wealthy. Nobody knows the truth. A year ago, his wife went missing. She has been gone for 384 days.
